speech:
Sherekea

-Medium sized plant which produces abundant light purple flowers
-Tubers are oblong/round and have red skin
-High number of tubers per plant
-Good storability 
-Long tuber dormancy
-Optimal production altitude: 1,800 – 3,000 m
-Maturity Period: 3.5 – 4 month
-Yield: 16,000 – 20,000kg per acre
-High resistant to Late Blight and viruses (PVY and PLRV)
-Use: boiling, roasting, mashing, chips, crisps
